about_the_game:
• This is a free exploration game with a custom portal but fixed universal space interaction. You can shuttle through the portal to any place, room, or world you want in the space. If you feel tired, you can also go to the leisure space to enjoy the unique music and anime, find more fun in leisure and entertainment, experience the interaction in different spaces, and feel the unique and ingenious atmosphere that makes people willing to immerse themselves. More content is being developed and produced in the future...

  • The game is set with a core disk magnet that utilizes both positive and negative gravity to achieve mutual inference effects and can be scaled up and down according to space. It is also a memory storage point

    

  • Along with some simple advances and jumps, it gradually upgrades to spatial teleportation and matrix walking

    

  • To travel back and forth between certain or fixed portals to different large/small rooms, resulting in poor visual effects, and to collect items appropriately to unlock more modern spaces and teleportation positions

    

  • Realize spatial matrix transmission through multiple portals, and explore various interesting styles by selecting different roads through infinite corridors

    

  • You can freely choose roads and corresponding or corresponding portals in the domain value space to enter different rooms, and then select other room types to collect items and unlock achievements through the entered room, opening up a chain space and interesting gameplay

    

  • This is a special statement to players: Due to the fact that this game was developed solely by the author and was developed using Love Power, many aspects are slightly lacking, especially in terms of materials and art, and even the game graphics look quite reminiscent of the early 1990s style. However, in the game trial version and official release version, we will do our best to collect players' opinions and suggestions and update and optimize them. Thank you for your support to independent game developers Please understand......
detailed_description:
• This is a free exploration game with a custom portal but fixed universal space interaction. You can shuttle through the portal to any place, room, or world you want in the space. If you feel tired, you can also go to the leisure space to enjoy the unique music and anime, find more fun in leisure and entertainment, experience the interaction in different spaces, and feel the unique and ingenious atmosphere that makes people willing to immerse themselves. More content is being developed and produced in the future...

  • The game is set with a core disk magnet that utilizes both positive and negative gravity to achieve mutual inference effects and can be scaled up and down according to space. It is also a memory storage point

    

  • Along with some simple advances and jumps, it gradually upgrades to spatial teleportation and matrix walking

    

  • To travel back and forth between certain or fixed portals to different large/small rooms, resulting in poor visual effects, and to collect items appropriately to unlock more modern spaces and teleportation positions

    

  • Realize spatial matrix transmission through multiple portals, and explore various interesting styles by selecting different roads through infinite corridors

    

  • You can freely choose roads and corresponding or corresponding portals in the domain value space to enter different rooms, and then select other room types to collect items and unlock achievements through the entered room, opening up a chain space and interesting gameplay

    

  • This is a special statement to players: Due to the fact that this game was developed solely by the author and was developed using Love Power, many aspects are slightly lacking, especially in terms of materials and art, and even the game graphics look quite reminiscent of the early 1990s style. However, in the game trial version and official release version, we will do our best to collect players' opinions and suggestions and update and optimize them. Thank you for your support to independent game developers Please understand......
legal_notice:
This is an independent game
If you download and play this game, it is assumed that you allow and agree to the following basic terms:
1. The player or "you" is prohibited from using illegal reverse engineering inputs or outputs while playing this game, and from reselling through any means such as disks or images without permission
2. It is prohibited to copy or crack the source code by any means
3. We sincerely hope that as a player, you can treat this game and the physics and scientific knowledge involved in it with sincerity, and bring you the best experience through game effects as much as possible

name: 奇域空间（自由探索版）-WonderIand Space(Free Exploration Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Intel i3 3240/AMD Ryzen 3 4100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960 4G/AMD Radeon RX 580 4G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win11
  • Processor: Intel i5 9400F/AMD Ryzen7 5800H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX1060 6G/AMD RX 5700XT 8G
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes:

short_description: This is a free exploration game with fixed universal space interaction. You can shuttle through the portal in the space to any room and world you want to go to. In addition, you can also go to the leisure space to enjoy music and anime. More content is being developed and produced in the future...
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
